description: a(n) = floor(2*sqrt(prime(n)-2)) where prime(n) = n-th prime.
links: J. R. Griggs, Spanning subset sums for finite Abelian groups, Discrete Math., 229 (2001), 89-99.
formula: For n=1, prime(1) is 2, and a(n) = 0.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 17 2001
extensions: Offset set to 1 by _Michel Marcus_, Nov 26 2015
